src_original: Vin_17.213 / dvārakoṣṭhake saṃsāracakrasya /  Vin_17.214 / gaṇḍapañcakasya karaṇaṃ /
Vin_17.215 / ūrdhaṃ d[e]vamanuṣyā[62a2]ṇām /  Vin_17.216 / caturṇāṃ dvīpānāṃ /
Vin_17.217 / aupapādukānāṃ satvānāṃ ghaṭiyaṃtravaccyavamānānām upapadyamānānāṃ ca rāgadveṣamohānāṃ pārāvatabhujaṃgasūkarākāreṇa /
Vin_17.219 / pratītasamutpādasya sāmantake dvādaśāṅgasya /  Vin_17.220 / sarvasyānityatayā gra[sta]sya /
